thread.title: Welcome back Mark Darcy! Colin Firth starts shooting 'Bridget Jones's Baby'
thread.title_full: Welcome back Mark Darcy! Colin Firth starts shooting 'Bridget Jones's Baby'

title: Welcome back Mark Darcy! Colin Firth starts shooting 'Bridget Jones's Baby'
text: Welcome back Mark Darcy! Colin Firth starts shooting 'Bridget Jones's Baby' Friday, 9 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) *Washington D.C., Oct. 9 (ANI): Colin Firth has started ' Bridget Jones 's Baby' shooting as he was spotted reuniting with Renee Zellweger at the set in London.* Washington D.C., Oct. 9 (ANI): Colin Firth has started 'Bridget Jones's Baby' shooting as he was spotted reuniting with Renee Zellweger at the set in London. The 55-year-old actor was shooting scenes for the third franchise in London and wore a black suit with blue scarf and held on to duffle bag, People reports. Zellweger was filming for the second day in a row and wore baggy overalls, a flannel shirt. Earlier, Patrick Dempsey joined the cast of the upcoming 'Bridget Jones's sequel alongside Firth and Zellweger. (ANI)
